feed.title: Lamport scheme (not signature) to economize on L1

entry.title: Lamport scheme (not signature) to economize on L1
entry.summary:
In an upcoming event, a Twitter Spaces session will be hosted to delve into the topic discussed. Interested individuals are encouraged to participate in this live conversation. To join the session and contribute to the dialogue, attendees can access the event through the provided link [Twitter Spaces Event](https://twitter.com/yurivillasboas/status/1743305920937963696). This platform offers an opportunity for real-time interaction and engagement on the subject matter at hand.
It is important to note that the invitation is extended to all who wish to attend, signifying an inclusive approach to the discussion. The host aims to foster a collaborative environment where diverse perspectives can be shared. The use of Proton Mail for communication emphasizes a commitment to security and privacy in correspondence.
